content: I was just going through my calendar for next week, and I realized we no longer seem to have a standing sync meeting for Mondays. Would the usual time still work for everyone?
I've updated the sync invite to go through the end of January
y'all mind if I join? I'm thrilled to death about this project.
I'll be fly on the wall unless you directly ask for a response. :-)
@Ralph I've included you in the invite, though as optional - it says here you might have a conflict for our usual timeslot
If you'd like and others don't object, we could also always record it

unfortunately I have a conflict with the time today, but if we want to continue to do these meetings we could start set them up again. Yosh I was under the impression you were no longer going to be contributing hence I didn't reach out about it, but sorry if I misunderstood.
@Yoshua Wuyts @Wassim Chegham would it be ok if we make the meeting for 10.30am today instead?
that would really help a lot with the conflict then we can make it a 30 min one, and not skip it
works for me! - I'll update the invite
I am sorry folks, I won't be able to join at that time. @Yoshua Wuyts Can you record the call for me please?

Guy Bedford said:

that would really help a lot with the conflict then we can make it a 30 min one, and not skip it

Oh ok then if we can make it 30min. I have a hard stop at 8pm.
I suspect we might not need the full hour; would love to have you for 30 mins if you can make it
